edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.spatial
Interface ICoordinateSystem

All Known Subinterfaces:
IBrainAtlasCoordinateSystem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllenCoordinateSystem, CoordinateSystem, DemoCoordinateSystem
public interface ICoordinateSystem

Interface that defines a coordinate system.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)

Method Summary
 float getMaximumXCoordinate()
           
 float getMaximumYCoordinate()
           
 float getMaximumZCoordinate()
           
 float getMinimumXCoordinate()
           
 float getMinimumYCoordinate()
           
 float getMinimumZCoordinate()
           
 float[] getOrigin()
          Returns a length 3 float array that contains x, y, and z coordinates for the origin of this coordinate system, relative to the absolute world coordinates of the rendering system
 float[] getXDirection()
          Returns a length 3 float array that contains x, y, and z coordinates for a unit vector that points in the +X direction for this coordinate system
 float[] getYDirection()
          Returns a length 3 float array that contains x, y, and z coordinates for a unit vector that points in the +Y direction for this coordinate system
 float[] getZDirection()
          Returns a length 3 float array that contains x, y, and z coordinates for a unit vector that points in the +Z direction for this coordinate system
